commit message: Merge branch 'newWizard' of github.com:SaferMobile/InTheClear into newWizard
successfully handling confirmation of SMS sender

Emergency SMS: activity finishes on send.
slight modification to Wizard.
added recipients in Emergency SMS now persisting into preferences

Wipe now happening in the background.  Panic Controller has NOT yet been brought up to speed, so expect some bugs if you run it.

I still have questions about UI (i.e. are we having notifications?  or does it just do its thing undetected.)  The answers here will effect how I rebuild the panic controller.
logo change and minor UI tweaks
refactored Wipe and Panic controlls to unify wipe logic
removed hack to TextBox, now leaves it up to system to handle key input capture
fixed Locale lookup bug, added Zero Wipe option to Wipe Manual
fixes to how this works for Nokia
change error read out on problem files to show folder name not path
updates for blackberry and wipe controller tuning
show path display for zero file
added latest touch versions of homescreen layout icons
users now properly notified in Panic Controller.
fixed minor issue with data wipe res
One-touch panic linguistic confusion solved as per https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/69
Auto-population of EditViews with preferences data so it's editable, as per https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/66
Data Wipe selector now always says 'None,' as per https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/35
removed countdown dialog, pushing its functionality into the panicStatus progress dialog.
Panic class text and lists fully legible, as per https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/71
Cleaning up emergency sms strings so sent message is under 140 chars
minor updates to test SMS copy and wipe selector
modified string file name added arabic and farsi
new tactic for wiping photos that involves replacing the image with a dummy image, refreshing the media scanner, and then deleting on scan callback.
Updates to PIMWiper and folder iterator
minor change to Logging of data.
localization updates, cleaning up Preferences activity, and adding deletion of folders as per https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/73
minor tweaks to english version of itc_strings so they match the app's main activity.  our translators will have to have a look at the farsi & arabic string files to make their adjustments, too.
sends user back to main activity, so as to force language changes to show up immediately.
updated localizations and add locale switch support

Cleaned up string files in attempt to fix https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/76 and added language selection dialog for virgin user as per https://github.com/SaferMobile/InTheClear/issues/77.  User is also no longer marked as virgin user once they reach the LAST wizard screen, rather than on launching the wizard.
adding in simplified CN itc_strings (goog transl version), removing duplicate values files
Alert Dialog added to bring user to preferences if not recipients have been set.
minor tweak regarding oneTouchPanic preference in the event no recipients have been set prior.
Fixed panic service so it does not hang when application is finished.
updated error details for wizard (and minor updates to language strings)
